titleStmt.title: A supplication to Eldertonne, for Leaches vnlewdnes desiring him to pardone, his manifest vnrudenes.

publicationStmt.publisher: At the long shop adioining vnto Saint Mildreds Church in the Pultry by Iohn Alde,
